app_title: Expert System: What to Watch on Netflix?
msg_inference_end: No more rules match your choices.

questions.genre: What genre are you in the mood for today?
questions.small-town-or-prison: Do you prefer a small-town vibe or a prison setting?
questions.scifi-supernatural: Are you interested in Sci-Fi or supernatural themes?
questions.handle-gore: Can you handle gore (strong, bloody scenes)?
questions.politics: Are you interested in politics in TV shows?
questions.need-action: Do you require a heavy dose of action?
questions.optimistic-cynical: Do you prefer an optimistic or cynical approach?
questions.crying: Are you in the mood for a good cry?
questions.criminals: Do you root for the criminals?
questions.forensics-psychology: Do you prefer forensics or psychology?
questions.meth: Are you interested in methamphetamine production?
questions.questionable-morals: Do you like your characters to have questionable morals?
questions.friend-group-family: Do you prefer watching a group of friends or a dysfunctional family?
questions.strong-female-characters: Do you like strong female characters?
questions.drugs: Do you want them to sell drugs?
questions.tina-amy: Who do you prefer: Tina Fey or Amy Poehler?
questions.james-franco-seth-rogen: Do you want to see James Franco & Seth Rogen as high schoolers?
questions.bar-cafe: Do you want your NYC friends to hang out at a bar or a cafe?
